category_description: Wall hangings that transform spaces and shift energy. Each one is a portal to somewhere else.
category_vibe: Tapestries aren't just decoration — they're instant atmosphere. Hang one up and suddenly your room feels like a meditation temple, a desert oasis, or a cosmic observatory.

products.name: Starmap of the Ancients
products.description: A deep indigo tapestry printed with a hand-drawn star map showing constellations as ancient cultures saw them — not just the Greek names we know, but Aboriginal, Chinese, and Arabic star stories too. It glows softly under blacklight. Large enough to cover a wall or use as a ceiling canopy.
products.origin: Designed in California, printed on organic cotton in India
products.tone_hint: This is a cosmic classroom on your wall. Talk about how it connects different cultures' relationships with the night sky.

products.name: Desert Mandala
products.description: A circular mandala in warm desert tones — burnt orange, terracotta, sage, and sand. The pattern radiates from a central eye, drawing you inward. Hand-printed by artisans in Rajasthan using traditional block-printing techniques that have been passed down for centuries.
products.tone_hint: This is meditation made visual. Talk about the centering effect of the mandala, the craftsmanship of block printing, the warmth of the colors.

products.name: Mushroom Forest Portal
products.description: An otherworldly forest scene filled with oversized mushrooms, luminescent moss, and hidden fairy doors. The colors are rich and saturated — deep greens, purples, and bioluminescent blues. It's like looking into another dimension. Perfect for anyone who loves fantasy, nature, or just wants their room to feel magical.
products.origin: Designed by a digital artist in Portland, printed on recycled polyester
products.tone_hint: This is pure escapism. Talk about the sense of wonder, the portal-to-another-world vibe, the joy of surrounding yourself with magic.

products.name: Sacred Geometry Grid
products.description: Black background with metallic gold sacred geometry — the Flower of Life, Metatron's Cube, and interlocking patterns that seem to pulse with mathematical harmony. This one's for the people who see the code underlying reality. Printed with metallic ink that catches light beautifully.
products.origin: Designed in Colorado, printed on organic cotton in USA
products.tone_hint: This is the universe's blueprint on your wall. Talk about sacred geometry as the language of creation, the visual satisfaction of perfect symmetry.

products.name: Ocean Wisdom
products.description: An underwater scene with a wise old sea turtle swimming through shafts of sunlight, surrounded by schools of fish and swaying kelp. The colors are peaceful blues and greens. This one brings the ocean's calm energy into your space. A portion of proceeds goes to ocean conservation efforts.
products.origin: Designed in Hawaii, printed on sustainable fabric
products.tone_hint: This brings ocean energy inland. Talk about the calming effect of water imagery, the wisdom of ancient creatures, the connection to conservation.

products.name: Vintage Zodiac Wheel
products.description: A vintage-style zodiac wheel with all twelve signs illustrated in an Art Nouveau style. Muted earth tones and celestial symbols create a mystical, timeless feel. Hand-drawn by an astrologer and artist in New Orleans who poured years of study into every detail.
products.origin: Designed in New Orleans, printed on organic cotton
products.tone_hint: This is astrology as art. Perfect for anyone who takes their star chart seriously or just loves the aesthetic of cosmic wisdom.
